word: Shall Teen-age Girls Canvass? [ELLEN WHITE DIRECTED SEVERAL LETTERS TO HER TWO TEEN-AGE GRANDDAUGHTERS, ELLA MAY AND MABEL, THAT POINTED OUT CERTAIN DANGERS THAT MIGHT THREATEN YOUNG WOMEN COLPORTEURS, WHILE NOT FORBIDDING THEIR PARTICIPATION IN THE LITERATURE WORK.]--I would not place any obstruction in your way in obtaining an experience in doing God service....
